name: Zombified Glory
description:
Zombified Glory

I made this 2.5d game in 1 day, it's a mixture of 8/16 bit retro style on a 64 bit engine (the graphics aren't actually 8/16 its only a few textures) the audio is also retro style, In the dodgy game you press A/D to move side to side and press LMB to kill zombies (you have to wait for the zombies to get close enough), you have a ~20% chance of a 2nd zombie spawning, the only issue is you can't really kill it so I guess your stuck with killing the same poor zombie over and over. Anyways I hope you get at least a minute of gameplay before getting ultimately bored and never opening the game again.

New - Ammo:

If you run out of ammo you cant shoot obviously

Every kill gets you 3 ammo

New - Background:

I added a crappy background so instead of just blue it has clouds now
